Package com.telenav.kivakit.resource.reading

Interface ReadableResource

All Superinterfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.value.count.ByteSized, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, Readable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter
All Known Subinterfaces:
FileService, Resource, WritableResource
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseReadableResource, BaseWritableResource, DataResource, File, InputResource, LocalFile, NullResource, OutputResource, PackageResource, ResourceSection, StringOutputResource, StringResource, ZipEntry
public interface ReadableResource extends Readable, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater
Interface to an object that is Readable and can be read with a ResourceReader.

Reading

  • charset()
  • reader()
  • reader(ProgressReporter)
  • reader(ProgressReporter, Charset)

Copying

  • copyTo(WritableResource, WriteMode, ProgressReporter)

Implementation

The resource() method must be defined by the implementer, as well as the method copyTo(WritableResource, WriteMode, ProgressReporter).

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
